mapper.select: SELECT APP_NAME, PROG_REF, IS_MANDATORY, IS_VISIBLE, IS_READONLY, ZERO_NOT_ALLOWED, LABEL_KEY, VISIBILITY_EXPR, READONLY_EXPR, MANDATORY_EXPR, ZERO_NOT_ALLOWED_EXPR, LABEL_KEY_EXPR,BACKGROUND_COLOR_EXPR FROM SYS_PARAM_SCREEN_DISPLAY WHERE PROG_REF = #{progRef} AND APP_NAME = #{appName} AND ( (VISIBILITY_EXPR LIKE '%' || #{expressionCode} || '%' AND IS_VISIBLE IN (2,3)) OR (READONLY_EXPR LIKE '%' || #{expressionCode} || '%' AND IS_READONLY IN (2,3)) OR (MANDATORY_EXPR LIKE '%' || #{expressionCode} || '%' AND IS_MANDATORY IN (2,3)) OR (LABEL_KEY_EXPR LIKE '%' || #{expressionCode} || '%') OR (BACKGROUND_COLOR_EXPR LIKE '%' || #{expressionCode} || '%') OR (ZERO_NOT_ALLOWED_EXPR LIKE '%' || #{expressionCode} || '%' AND ZERO_NOT_ALLOWED IN (2,3)) )

choose.when: SELECT TBL.CIF_TYPE FROM (SELECT CIF_TYPE, COUNT(CIF_TYPE)CC FROM CIF GROUP BY CIF_TYPE ORDER BY CC DESC)TBL WHERE ROWNUM < = #{topN}
choose.otherwise: SELECT TOP ${topN} * FROM (SELECT CIF_TYPE, COUNT(CIF_TYPE)CC FROM CIF GROUP BY CIF_TYPE)T ORDER BY T.CC DESC
